api_list.name: /game-data/origin/patches
api_list.description: Get IDs of different patches of origin game version
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://axie-data-hub.p.rapidapi.com/game-data/origin/patches"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "axie-data-hub.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://axie-data-hub.p.rapidapi.com/game-data/origin/patches"

headers = {

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "axie-data-hub.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /game-data/origin/cards
api_list.description: Get origin ability cards data. You can filter by any valid card object property, such as 'class', 'type' or 'abilityType'. E.g. '/cards/origin?class=reptile&type=mouth&abilityType=AttackRanged'. Theese filters are not available if you use 'format=original'

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Format of the response: 'default' or 'original'. Original has the original format response given by Axie Infinity. Default is a better formatted version of the original response. Default format is 'default'.

api_list.name: /game-data/classic/cards/patches
api_list.description: Get info of different cards balance patches of classic game version.
api_list.code:

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "axie-data-hub.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /game-data/origin/cards/{patchId}
api_list.description: Get origin ability cards data from specific patch. You can filter by any valid card object property, such as 'class', 'type' or 'abilityType'. E.g. '/cards/origin?class=reptile&type=mouth&abilityType=AttackRanged'. Theese filters are not available if you use 'format=original'

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Format of the response: 'default' or 'original'. Original has the original format response given by Axie Infinity. Default is a better formatted version of the original response. Default format is 'default'.

api_list.name: /game-data/origin/tools/{patchId}
api_list.description: Get origin card tools data from specific patch.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Format of the response: 'default' or 'original'. Original has the original format response given by Axie Infinity. Default is a better formatted version of the original response. Default format is 'default'.

api_list.name: /game-data/classic/cards/{patchId}
api_list.description: Get classic ability cards data from specific patch. You can filter by any valid card object property, such as 'class' or 'type'. E.g. '/cards/classic/current?class=reptile&type=mouth'. Theese filters are not available if you use 'format=original'

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Format of the response: 'default' or 'original'. Original has the original format response given by Axie Infinity. Default is a better formatted version of the original response. Default format is 'default'.

api_list.name: /version
api_list.description: Get current API data source version. This version may be different as the version of Axie Data Hub API deployed on RapidAPI.
